set(APP_NAME toggltracktasks)

# The MACOSX_BUNDLE_ICON_FILE variable is added to the Info.plist
# generated by CMake. This variable contains the .icns file name,
# without the path.
set(MACOSX_BUNDLE_ICON_FILE icon.icns)

# And the following tells CMake where to find and install the file itself.
set(APP_ICON_MACOS "icons/${MACOSX_BUNDLE_ICON_FILE}")
set_source_files_properties(${APP_ICON_MACOS} PROPERTIES MACOSX_PACKAGE_LOCATION "Resources")

qt_add_executable(${APP_NAME}
    main.cpp
    ${APP_ICON_MACOS}
)

qt_add_qml_module(${APP_NAME}
    URI TogglTrackTasks
    VERSION 1.0
    QML_FILES
    qml/main.qml
    RESOURCES
    icons/app.svg
    icons/password_visible.svg
    icons/password_hidden.svg
)

set_target_properties(${APP_NAME} PROPERTIES
    MACOSX_BUNDLE_GUI_IDENTIFIER borco.toggltracktasks
    MACOSX_BUNDLE_BUNDLE_VERSION ${PROJECT_VERSION}
    MACOSX_BUNDLE_SHORT_VERSION_STRING ${PROJECT_VERSION_MAJOR}.${PROJECT_VERSION_MINOR}
    MACOSX_BUNDLE TRUE
    WIN32_EXECUTABLE TRUE
)

target_link_libraries(${APP_NAME} PRIVATE
    Qt6::Quick
    keychain
    TogglTrackTasksLib
#    TogglTrackTasksLibplugin
)
